definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: rafter, beam (prop. a thing meeting, fitting into, another);—sf. [[קׂרָתִי]] Ge 19:8 (J) = my roof-tree; pl. [[קׂרוֹת]] rafters, abs. 2Ch 3:7, cstr. ‖ 1Ki 6:15 b (reading [[קוֹרוֹת הַסִּפֻּן]] LXX Th Kit Benz, for MT [[קִירוֹת]]), + 1Ki 7:7 b (reading [[הַקּוֹרוֹת]] for [[הַקַּרְקָָע]], v. ´[[ק]]:); Ct So 1:17 (‖[[רחיטנו ]] Kt, [[רָהִיטֵנוּ]] Qr); more gen beam, sg. abs. [[קוֹרָה]] 2Ki 6:2, 2Ki 6:5.
